headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: ID of the Video that you want to fix.

parameters.name: auto_bind_enabled
parameters.description: Whether to automatically upload the fixed video to your creative library. Default value: False .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: Video ID. Returned when there are no issues detected.

fields.name: fix_task_id
fields.description: Fix task ID. Returned when issues are detected.

fields.name: flaw_types
fields.description: Returned when issues are detected. Video issue types. Enum values: LOW_RESOLUTION : Video resolution is lower than 540x960 px, which doesn't meet our requirements. ILLEGAL_VIDEO_SIZE : The video size is not correct. Use the standard video size: Square (1:1) / Vertical (9:16) / Horizontal (16:9). NO_BGM ( deprecated ): The ad or video has no background audio, or the background audio is incoherent/unclear. BLACK_EDGE ( deprecated ) : A video image contains black bars, which affects user experience and is not allowed. ILLEGAL_DURATION ( deprecated ): Video length is either longer than 60s or shorter than 5s, which doesn't meet our requirements.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
